title: I won my game, but it says I lost a game in my promo....
body:
Hi,

I just won a game after being DC for a little bit, but I came back and won the game. It even said Victory in the result screen, but it counted as a loss in the diamond icon next to the "Victory." I was 2-1 on going to Plat, but I am now 2-2. Please let me know if anyone know what to do in this situation. Thanks.

replies.body:
The first issue I want to address here is the disconnecting. Have you been dealing with disconnections frequently and where exactly is it happening? 

The second part to this is even though it wasn't your fault, disconnecting leaves your team at a disadvantage. So, even though you came back you won't reap the rewards for returning as your team had no idea if you were returning.

> [{quoted}](name=Dark Morgana,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AULEwiRA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-08T00:28:02.454+0000)

> The first issue I want to address here is the disconnecting. Have you been dealing with disconnections frequently and where exactly is it happening? 
> 
> The second part to this is even though it wasn't your fault, disconnecting leaves your team at a disadvantage. So, even though you came back you won't reap the rewards for returning as your team had no idea if you were returning.

The same thing happened to me except I didn't even DC from the game. Regular first game of promo, no problems and result was a victory. Promo counter counted it as a loss for some reason.

> [{quoted}](name=TailSurprise,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AULEwiRA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-17T21:01:11.000+0000)
>
> The same thing happened to me except I didn't even DC from the game. Regular first game of promo, no problems and result was a victory. Promo counter counted it as a loss for some reason.

Heyo! It looks like you dodged a game yesterday which counted as the first lost in your series. After losing a game and then winning a game, your series is at 1 win and 2 losses. Good luck in your series to Gold!

> [{quoted}](name=Keyru,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AULEwiRA,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-11-17T21:06:39.084+0000)
>
> Heyo! It looks like you dodged a game yesterday which counted as the first lost in your series. After losing a game and then winning a game, your series is at 1 win and 2 losses. Good luck in your series to Gold!

How come my first win didn't count as a win though? My first first promo game was a victory but as soon as i loaded into post-game lobby it was only 1 "x" with Victory

Doesn't make sense. The TF game was my first promo game and I hadn't dodged a promo game before that. I'm certain I dodged the champ select before the Teemo Victory because I disconnected from the champ select and remember I didn't mind because I still just needed 1 win to enter promos. After that I go to play my first promo game which was the TF victory and post-game returns as                      "X - - - - "
IT HAPPENS ME THE SAME LOOK THE FKING ANSWER: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/thN9oPqA-won-last-game-of-promos-appears-as-a-win-but-lost-promos
